body_html: Re the other comment, I think the idea is that Type is not actually a public facing interface, so it doesn't matter if getType has a long and twisty name, so it's good to discourage people from using it.
body_text: Re the other comment, I think the idea is that Type is not actually a public facing interface, so it doesn't matter if getType has a long and twisty name, so it's good to discourage people from using it.
body: Re the other comment, I think the idea is that Type is not actually a public facing interface, so it doesn't matter if `getType` has a long and twisty name, so it's good to discourage people from using it.
